lines.i: A radiopharmaceutical used in the diagnosis, management, and treatment of disease.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] activity with data type Physical Quantity
The measured quantity of the activity of the radiopharmaceutical used.

Contains zero or one [0..1] id with data type Id
"A unique identifier for this instance. If the product instance represents a single individual product (quantity = 1) then this id is also called the "serial number". If the product instance represents a product lot, the id is also called the "lot number"." - HL7 V3

Contains zero or one [0..1] unitPrice with data type Monetary Amount
This is the price of the medication per dispense unit.

Contains exactly one [1..1] activity with data type Physical Quantity
The measured quantity of the activity of the radiopharmaceutical used.
Contains exactly one [1..1] packagedMedicinalProduct, where its type is Packaged Medicinal Product
Contains zero or more [0..*] drugPricing, where its type is Drug Pricing
Contains zero or one [0..1] manufacturingLot, where its type is Manufacturing Lot
